indexing.paragraph: A seasoned supply chain professional with over 10 years of experience specializing in Manhattan WMOS implementations, configurations, and integrations. I'm passionate about optimizing warehouse operations and driving efficiency gains for clients across various industries.

My expertise spans from requirements gathering and system design to testing, post-implementation support. I'm a strong communicator and collaborator, always eager to tackle complex challenges and deliver impactful results.
I also have a good relationship with other people in the same industry meaning I do not only bring my own expertise, but also have a solid network of expertise behind me.
If you think your business can make use of my services, please do not hesitate to contact me.
